definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: I can not sleep in bed, imagine the sea grouper and barracuda.
sentences.chinese: 我在床上无法入眠，幻想着海中的石斑鱼和梭鱼。

sentences.english: He tossed fretfully and could not get to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 但是东想西想，急躁地翻来覆去终夜不能入眠。

sentences.english: And the ancient empty street's too dead for dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 而这空旷旧街的死寂，又叫人不能入眠。

sentences.english: No, I can't sleep , I'm barely hangin' on.
sentences.chinese: 不，我无法入眠，我仅仅能呆呆的待在那里。

sentences.english: Love you so I don't wanna go to sleep, for reality is better than a dream.
sentences.chinese: 爱你，以是不想入眠，因为实在比黑甜乡还要漂亮。

sentences.english: His wife has to sleep safely, snore like thunder.
sentences.chinese: 妻已安然入眠，鼾声如雷。

sentences.english: I just want to curl up with my husband and dog.
sentences.chinese: 我只想蜷缩在床上和我的丈夫和狗一起入眠。

sentences.english: I have so much trouble sleeping at night.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上我就难以入眠。

sentences.english: Every winter night, she must borrow heating or electric blanket, can sleep.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天的夜晚，她需借着暖气或电热毯，才能入眠。

sentences.english: Let me be Your dream, That You sleep with alone at night.
sentences.chinese: 我愿是您美梦，夜夜伴您入眠。

sentences.english: I go to sleep alone, and wake up alone.
I was so somber last night that couldn’t sleep.
Hermes hoped that the music would put Argus to sleep, but it didn't.
sentences.chinese: 赫密斯希望音乐能让阿格斯入眠，但他并未睡着。

sentences.english: Many nights when sleep evaded[7] me, I would think about the beautiful lady.
sentences.chinese: 很多个无法入眠的夜晚，我都会想起那个美丽女子。

sentences.english: I'm so worried that I can't sleep a wink.
sentences.chinese: 我非常担心，以至于一整夜难以入眠。

sentences.english: "You know, I hardly sleep, " said Karume.

definition: sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
the whole night/all through the night
